別府温泉「浴場ごと」お届け…テント生地の簡易施設内に浴槽

07 Nov 2019, 02:40

　全国有数の温泉地・大分県別府市が、別府温泉を浴場ごと各地に届ける事業を始める。送風機で膨らませて作るテント生地の簡易施設内に浴槽を設置し、トラックのタンクから湯を送る「掛け流しスタイル」だ。将来的には被災地での利用も想定している。


幻想の湯の外観図（ビービズリンク提供）

　施設は縦横１０メートル、高さ６・４メートル。男女別に繊維強化プラスチック（ＦＲＰ）製の浴槽（縦２・２メートル、横３メートル、深さ７０センチ）を設置し、脱衣場も備える。湯は別府市内の源泉でくみ上げ、適温とされる４０～４２度で提供できるよう専用のタンクを積んだトラックで現地に運ぶ。


幻想の湯の中のイメージ図（ビービズリンク提供）

　二つの浴槽で一度に計１０人ほどが入浴でき、利用定員は１日約３００人まで。料金は届ける場所によって異なり、１日分で東京２００万円程度、九州内１００万円程度を見込んでいる。
　別府温泉のアピールにつながり、災害時にも活用できるとして市が約１５００万円で事業化した。「幻想の湯」と名付けられ、市のＰＲなどを担う一般社団法人「Ｂ―ｂｉｚ　ＬＩＮＫ（ビービズリンク）」が運用する。
　市は９日、同市内で開かれる温泉シンポジウムの場で初披露する。長野恭紘市長は「色々なイベントに出向きたい。災害時に要請があれば（被災者のためにも）役立てたい」と話している。
　問い合わせはビービズリンク（０９７７・７６・５２０５）へ。
text:
Beppu Onsen “Every Bathhouse” Delivery ... Bathtub in a simple facility of tent fabric

07 Nov 2019, 02:40

全国 Beppu City, Oita Prefecture, one of the nation's leading hot spring resorts, starts a business to deliver Beppu hot springs to the various locations along with the baths. This is a “flowing style” in which a bathtub is set up in a simple facility of tent fabric that is inflated with a blower and hot water is sent from the tank of the truck. In the future, it is also expected to be used in disaster areas.


External view of Genso-no-Yu (provided by BizLink)

The facility is 10 meters long and 6.4 meters high. A fiber reinforced plastic (FRP) bathtub (length: 2.2 meters, width: 3 meters, depth: 70 centimeters) is installed for each gender, and a dressing room is also provided. Hot water is pumped up at a source in Beppu city and transported to the site by a truck loaded with a dedicated tank so that it can be served at an appropriate temperature of 40-42 degrees.


Image of fantasy bath (provided by BizLink)

Approximately 10 people can bathe in two bathtubs at a time, and the capacity is up to about 300 people a day. The fee varies depending on the delivery location, and is expected to be about 2 million yen in Tokyo per day and 1 million yen in Kyushu.
The city has been commercialized for about 15 million yen because it is connected to the appeal of Beppu Onsen and can be used in the event of a disaster. It is named “Gensoyu” and is operated by “B-biz LINK”, a general incorporated association responsible for PR of the city.
The city will debut on the 9th at the hot spring symposium held in the city. Mayor Nagano said, “I want to go to various events. If there is a request in the event of a disaster (and for the victims),” he said.
For inquiries, please contact BizLink (0977, 75.5205).
